comment: I've been using this for the entire admin home page.  `domain` could be taken out of both the first and second attributes.  `generatedCodes` should be changed to `generatedKeys`.  Also, I've been using the same call to populate favorite domains, top domains by keys generated, and top titles.  I think the first two have the same fields, but top titles by activation has domain name, author name, isbn, total activations, and activations this month.
